title: Professional Competency Enhancement Course Based on Active Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Job-Related Concepts (Entry-Level in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields)
context.additional_context: Utilizing diverse personal devices (BYOD), emphasizing formative assessments based on real-time interaction and reflection

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate critical thinking skills through the analysis of professional social issues on an online discussion platform with an 80% or higher participation rate
Learners can enhance problem-solving skills by collaborating with peers to write case study reports using digital collaboration tools
Learners can evaluate their learning process through weekly reflective journals and develop improvement plans with 100% completion
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
